entities.name: MICROSOFT
entities.description: Microsoft is a technology company positioned as a strategic digital transformation platform and partner of choice for organizations by providing cloud services, AI capabilities, hybrid infrastructure, and more.

entities.name: AZURE
entities.description: Azure is Microsoft's trusted cloud platform that offers comprehensive compliance coverage, AI-based security, hybrid consistency, developer productivity, and trusted security and compliance.

entities.name: NUANCE COMMUNICATIONS, INC.
entities.description: Nuance Communications, Inc. is a cloud and AI software provider with healthcare and enterprise AI experience, acquired by Microsoft to build on industry-specific cloud offerings.

relationships.relationship_description: Azure is Microsoft's trusted cloud platform, providing various cloud services and capabilities.
Microsoft acquired Nuance Communications, Inc. to enhance its industry-specific cloud offerings.
